title: Garlic Parmesan Potato Skillet
ingredients: 2 large potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the sliced potatoes and onion to the skillet. Cook until the potatoes are golden brown and crispy, stirring occasionally.
Add the minced garlic, dried rosemary, salt, and pepper. Stir well to evenly distribute the flavors.
Continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes until the garlic is fragrant.
Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese over the potatoes. Stir gently to melt the cheese and coat the potatoes evenly.
Remove from heat and garnish with chopped fresh parsley.
Serve hot as a side dish or a main course.
